Despite spending billions on in-person and remote translators—mostly through outdated call centers—hospitals still fail to provide adequate care for non-English-speaking patients.

We're building the most accurate and compliant medical language translation system across voice and video modalities.
one_liner: Voice AI for medical language translation

name: Truffle AI
long_description: Truffle AI makes it easy for developers to integrate AI agents into any software application. We do this by exposing agents as simple APIs that can be called from anywhere. Developers have used Truffle to add customer support agents into WhatsApp and analytics agents into Slack.
one_liner: AWS for AI Agents

name: Toothy AI
long_description: We’re Toothy.ai.  We’re building AI agents for dental practices that handle everything related to patient insurance. The average dental clinic spends over 160 hours a month on insurance tasks like verifying patient policies, billing, and claims processing. Our AI agents automate this entire workflow—including making insurance calls with voice AI—saving clinics time, reducing costs, and ensuring faster reimbursements.
one_liner: AI for insurance verification & billing at dental clinics

name: General Agency
long_description:
We are building Tessa, an AI coworker that can autonomously learn and master the usage of web-based tools, just like a human does. 

To accomplish this, we are building a novel neural architecture that enables autonomous self-improvement in AI agents. So far, we've achieved a state-of-the-art success rate of 93% on the WebVoyager benchmark.

We are working to automate workflows in several verticals, including property management & real estate, financial services, and consulting.
one_liner: AI coworkers that can learn and act just like a human

name: Tejas AI
long_description: Tejas AI eliminates uncertainty, allowing decision-makers to develop and evaluate credit rules more quickly and effectively.
one_liner: Risk Decisioning Platform for Banks

name: Weave
long_description:
Weave uses AI to measure engineering.

We scan every PR and understand how much work people are doing and how good it is.
one_liner: AI to measure engineering work

name: Maive
long_description:
Maive automates aerospace compliance paperwork required on the manufacturing shop floor. We use cameras and AI to automatically fill federally-required paperwork, reducing the risk of companies being unable to sell their products and increasing factory throughput.

Users have told us the paperwork required for the F-35 fighter jet weighs more than the jet itself! The government requires a record for each of the 1.5 million parts in the jet, including what shop-floor workers do to each part and when they do it.

Automating paperwork by interpreting human actions with cameras is hard. Doing this at the edge and inside secure aerospace environments is harder. We fine-tune the latest vision language models to solve what was previously impossible.

Manufacturers lose millions when compliance paperwork has errors because it can freeze their ability to sell the product for months. Leaving this task to shop floor workers is both incredibly risky to the company and tedious for the employees. 

Compliance paperwork is just the beginning. We want to propel American manufacturing into the AI era. America is facing a serious problem: there’s $400B being invested to onshore manufacturing, but there’s simultaneously a projected 15% gap in workers needed due to an aging workforce. We’re on a mission to solve this by building the first AI native software for the shop floor. Our vision is to intelligently connect people, robots, and data to 10x today’s manufacturing capacity.
one_liner: Visual AI for factories

name: Trim
long_description: Trim is building a general intelligence AI model that can simulate real-world physical systems evolving over time. For example, given the starting position of waves on a beach, the model generates how those waves move forward in time.
one_liner: A foundation model for physics.

name: Cardamon
long_description:
Cardamon is an AI powered platform that ingests relevant regulation, understands what applies to each regulated financial firm, and gets compliance officers from regulation, to obligations, to product requirements in minutes - not weeks.

Financial firms face a host of complex regulations that make it incredibly painful to launch and maintain products in a compliant way. As a Product team at Revolut, we felt this pain deeply ourselves - we had products ready to launch but stuck in compliance limbo, often for weeks. Turns out, getting compliant took as long as building the product itself. 

Frustrated, we dug in and were shocked by how manual and inefficient the processes were. That’s when it clicked: there’s a huge opportunity to automate the boring stuff (and solve our own problem!). Compliance teams win because they ditch the tedious tasks. Product teams win because they ship faster. Everyone’s happy.
one_liner: AI compliance co-pilot for regulated financial businesses

name: Mecha Health
long_description:
Mecha Health builds foundation models to automate x-ray analysis for radiologists. We take medical images and process them using proprietary models to produce accurate draft medical reports. Our first model was built in less than two months, and beat Microsoft, Google, and OpenAI on clinical accuracy metrics. On top of that, it’s two orders of magnitude smaller and trained with a quarter of the data.

We are partnering with the largest privately owned radiology practice in the US and a multinational tele-radiology company to provide them with their own foundation model, enabling their radiologists to go from reading 1 scan per hour to 1 scan every 5 minutes. By charging on a per scan basis, x-ray report generation represents a 40B+ market opportunity.
one_liner: Foundation models to automate x-ray analysis for radiologists

name: Cuckoo Labs
long_description:
Cuckoo is a real-time AI translator for global sales, marketing, and support. Companies like Snowflake and PagerDuty use Cuckoo in Zoom and in-person meetings for even the most technical discussions.

Cuckoo instantly learns the technical details of your conversation from your keywords and documents and interprets into over 20 languages—customized for your specific industry and organization.
one_liner: Real-time AI translator for global sales and marketing

name: hud
long_description:
Sam Altman and Dario Amodei have both said that we’ll have virtual coworkers by the end of the year.

The issue is, current agents aren’t reliable enough to perform at a human-level at these tasks. We solve this by making it easy to build evals and run them at scale for top agent developers like foundation labs (nda), Browser Use and Silverstream.

Our platform works by making it easy for domain-specific experts to create evals for their area of expertise. We're working with experts from every occupation from PMs to Accountants to Financial Analysts to make evals that the labs can then be used to evaluate and eventually train computer agents using RL.
one_liner: hud is building evals for the drop-in worker

name: Olive
long_description: Olive connects to your database & third party services to help you build admin dashboards and support tools in minutes.
one_liner: Build internal tools for your data with natural language.

name: Gale
long_description: Gale makes getting a visa suck less. We’re disrupting the $10B immigration services market, starting with US business visas and green cards. We've simplified the visa application process to a web form, streamlined compliance, and can integrate with HR systems - saving teams time, money and headaches. By using AI and automation we enable the independent attorneys we coordinate with to maintain quality whilst being more efficient.
one_liner: AI Powered Immigration Platform

name: Asteroid
long_description: Asteroid builds and hosts browser AI agents for complex tasks. With built-in guardrails, evaluations and human oversight, we ensure enterprise-grade reliability across millions of operations in regulated industries.
one_liner: Browser agents for regulated industries

name: Pickle
long_description: Pickle is a persistent AI clone that speaks in your voice, learns from your behavior, and connects on your behalf whether you’re asleep, focused, or on the other side of the world.
one_liner: We're building a living digital clone for everyone.

name: Harbera
long_description: Harbera helps clinic keep their doctors credentialed and compliant. Our AI software continuously monitors and proactively helps admin teams re-credential doctors, preventing denied claims, disruptions in patient care, and lost revenue caused by doctors falling out-of-network.
one_liner: AI Healthcare Provider Credentialing Software

name: Mundo AI
long_description: AI models are terrible in non-English languages because it's nearly impossible to find training data in other languages. So, we're building the world's largest and highest-quality multilingual data library.
one_liner: High Quality Multilingual Training Data for AI Models

name: Trata
long_description: Trata is an AI-powered research desk for hedge funds. We use agents to interview hedge fund analysts, write investment research, and distribute this through a subscription.
one_liner: AI-powered research desk for hedge funds

name: Confident AI
long_description: Confident AI allows companies of all sizes to benchmark, safeguard, and improve LLM applications, with best-in-class metrics and guardrails powered by DeepEval. Built by the creators of DeepEval (4.3k stars, >400k monthly downloads), Confident AI is able to offer battle-tested, open-source evaluation algorithms while providing the infrastructure needed for teams to stay confident their LLM systems.
one_liner: Open-Source Unit Testing for LLM Applications

name: Calltree AI
long_description: Calltree makes enterprise-grade AI support reps for call centers. Our AI reps take voice calls and chats like other AI support agents but can also use internal enterprise tools like a homegrown CRM or internal dashboards, like the highly trained humans working there today.
one_liner: Enterprise-grade AI support reps for call centers

name: Harper
long_description:
At Harper, we are building a fully autonomous commercial insurance brokerage powered by AI. Our initial focus is on mid-sized businesses with complex insurance needs, but our vision is to eventually serve every business in the country.

By leveraging AI to automate key workflows in the insurance process, we efficiently secure optimal coverage for each client's unique requirements at competitive prices and with rapid turnaround. Our AI system learns from the expertise of our brokers, accumulating not just knowledge but also the specific workflows, data, and capabilities that pave the way to full autonomy.
one_liner: AI-native commercial insurance brokerage

name: Sennu AI
long_description: Sennu's AI agents automate Salesforce functional testing. Just connect your user stories and we'll take care of the rest.
one_liner: Hands off Salesforce QA

name: Artificial Societies
long_description:
Artificial Societies uses AI to simulate large groups of people and how they interact. Companies like Anthropic and 11x are using Artificial Societies to predict how their marketing and content will perform in a simulation of their target customers, before launching in the real world. 

This is a cracked team: James left rural China at age 14, got into Cambridge, turned down a CS PhD to do startups, and - in his spare time - lead the largest ever study of an LLM society. James is joined by Patrick, an applied behavioural scientist who has run over 200 real-world experiments for businesses including Fortune 500 companies. 

We joined forces through a shared frustration that no one really understands large scale human behaviours: traditional market research is not only slow and expensive, but fundamentally flawed - it misses how people influence each other. Humans are not isolated individuals, we are social animals.

We began by simulating a network of 1,000 investors, and used it to raise a pre-seed and get into YC. Since releasing this publicly as “Wave”, startup founders have run over 3000 simulations. 

We have since released "Reach", where anyone can simulate their own LinkedIn audience and test how their posts will perform before posting for real. Artificial Societies is doing for simulations what ChatGPT did for LLMs - making them accessible to everyone.

As AI advances, we will create representative models of entire human societies. Our vision is a world where all content, products, and policies are first simulated in an Artificial Society. We are on a mission to create Artificial Collective Intelligence - humans innovate in collectives, we want to scale collective innovation with ACI.
one_liner: We use AI to simulate entire human societies

name: AfterQuery
long_description: AfterQuery is a research lab (backed by Y Combinator) investigating the boundaries and capabilities of artificial intelligence through novel datasets and experimentation. We believe that pushing the frontiers of AI requires both rigorous scientific inquiry and exceptional human data.
one_liner: Research lab investigating the boundaries of AI capabilities.

name: Mastra
long_description: Mastra is the easiest way to build a production AI application, built by the team that brought you Gatsby. We provide a complete set of AI primitives: workflows for complex operations, agents for autonomous decisions, RAG for knowledge integration, and evals for quality & accuracy. Mastra is open-source, modular, and built in Typescript for product developers. You can deploy Mastra on any cloud, and it gives you a straightforward syntax to solve the hardest problems building with AI: human-in-the-loop workflows, agent memory and tool selection, and output quality.
one_liner: The Javascript framework for building AI agents, from the Gatsby devs

name: Woz
long_description:
Woz is an AI platform that enables anyone to build and scale real software businesses - no coding required.

Historically, the ability to write code and architect software served as a massive barrier to business building. Woz eliminates this barrier with a team of AI agents that enable anyone, regardless of technical ability, to build products, go to market and grow a business all on one platform without a technical cofounder or inhouse engineering team. 

To start, we’re helping entrepreneurs build high quality mobile apps and launch them directly to the app store. For example, one of our first customers is a personal trainer building a fitness app for his clients. Ultimately, Woz aims to be the default platform where millions of AI-enabled entrepreneurs launch and scale businesses.

Woz is built by a team of engineers and ML scientists who've worked together building complex AI systems for the last decade. We're backed by YC, Untapped Ventures, MGV and more.
one_liner: AI platform enabling anyone to build and scale software businesses

name: Spott
long_description:
Spott is the first AI-native ATS/CRM for recruiting & staffing firms. We built Spott because existing recruitment platforms require extensive manual work, are clunky to use, rely on fragmented add-ons, and are not designed for AI adoption.

Spott combines everything recruiting firms need, from a full ATS & CRM to AI agents across the entire workflow, into one AI-native solution. It enables recruiters to focus on what matters most and close more placements.
one_liner: AI-native ATS/CRM for recruiting firms

name: Rebolt
long_description:
Rebolt lets everyone in the company build apps, and agents by speaking with AI.

Integrated with your company tools, data and authentication. Replacing no-code tools, bloated SaaS and complex spreadsheets, for automating all the boring work.
one_liner: Build apps and agents by speaking with AI

name: Roark
long_description:
Roark automates the creation of voice agent test suites from real customer journeys and AI-driven edge-case predictions, so you can validate every path before deployment. Instantly import any existing production call - or generate variations for different languages, accents, background noise levels, and more, as repeatable test cases without writing a single line of code.

Integrate regression testing directly into your CI/CD pipeline, triggering automated test suites on every build to catch regressions early. Our Evaluator blocks framework tests latency, load-testing, red-team scenarios, tool calls, compliance checks, and custom pass/fail rules tailored to your SLAs.

Ship voice AI updates with confidence, knowing every flow, language variant, and edge condition has been rigorously tested.
one_liner: Datadog for Voice AI

name: CopyCat
long_description: CopyCat is the next-gen RPA using browser agents. With our self-serve builder, users can automate complex web workflows by combining intelligent browser agent prompts with deterministic actions. These automations can be deployed in the cloud, triggered via API, or scheduled to run automatically.
one_liner: The AI RPA - Powered by Browser Agents

name: Ergo
long_description: Ergo is AI for sales teams, monitoring customer communication across tools like Zoom, Email, and Slack to keep CRMs such as HubSpot and Salesforce up to date. Ergo’s AI agents execute revenue-generating activities, such as automating mid-funnel follow-ups based on external market signals and past customer interactions. By eliminating manual operational tasks, Ergo helps sales teams maintain active pipelines, prevent deals from stalling, and cut sales cycles in half.
one_liner: AI Agents for Sales Operations

name: ThirdLayer
long_description:
ThirdLayer is an applied research and product lab building the next interface for human–AI collaboration.

Our first product is Dex, an AI copilot for the browser. Think Cursor for knowledge work, optimized for speed and embedded directly where you work.

Most web agents are built for set-and-forget tasks. But real work is fluid and messy—spread across tabs, tools, and evolving decisions. Dex transforms your browser into an intelligent, multimodal workspace that understands your intent through voice, text, and action. It enhances familiar interfaces, automates tedious steps, and removes the friction of handoffs.

Beneath the surface, Dex is more than a browser agent — it’s a foundation for:

● Long-term, cross-modal memory grounded in real workflows
● A new interaction layer to replace static UI with a collaborative canvas 
● Personalization: understanding how individuals approach tasks and navigate software

We're building the infrastructure for adaptive, intent-aware systems that work the way you do.
one_liner: Building Dex, the AI Browser Copilot

name: Vantel
long_description:
Vantel builds AI software for commercial insurance brokers.

Our first product doubles their productivity by automating policy analysis and contract review.
one_liner: AI Software for Commercial Insurance Brokers

name: Wayline
long_description: Wayline is an AI front desk assistant purpose-built for real estate to answer calls and messages 24/7. It’s like an always-on property manager that can convert leads and resolve issues better than any human, day or night. Our AI can be setup in as little as 24 hours and works seamlessly with existing phone/management software. Uniquely, our AI knowledge base is domain-specific to learn and handle the most complex real estate workflows. For property operators, Wayline instantly replaces robo-menus and call centers, while centralizing and scaling back-office teams.
one_liner: AI voice assistant for real estate managers

name: Mentra
long_description: Mentra is building the open source operating system for smart glasses. The smart glasses hardware is finally ready, so we're building the OS and app store to power the next computing platform.
one_liner: Building the open source smart glasses operating system.

name: Chestnut
long_description: Chestnut is the first AI mortgage lender. We automate 99% of human work with AI agents, saving customers 0.5%+ in interest. This is Spencer's second mortgage startup; the first processes 2% of US mortgages annually. So far, Chestnut is licensed in Texas and Colorado where we power purchases, refinances, cash-outs, and more.
one_liner: The first AI mortgage lender

name: Frekil
long_description:
AI is transforming healthcare, but the biggest bottleneck remains—procuring and annotating medical images with speed, accuracy, and scale. Frekil eliminates this roadblock.

Frekil helps healthcare AI teams, medical device companies, and pharmaceutical companies procure and annotate medical images like X-rays, CTs, MRIs, etc., efficiently for AI training, clinical trials, and FDA approvals. Our AI-assisted platform speeds up annotation 10x while maintaining high accuracy through real-time quality control, consensus checks, and advanced 3D visualization.

We also provide tools to track annotator performance, build custom workflows, and increase labeling accuracy. By combining efficiency with precision, Frekil enables teams to build high-quality datasets much faster, supporting the development and deployment of reliable medical AI and clinical research solutions.
one_liner: Scale AI for Medical Scans

name: Kashikoi
long_description: Kashikoi is a simulation engine to benchmark AI agents. We generate CPU friendly world models that autonomously interview agents and generate deep behavioral assessments. We built a similar technology at Moveworks which was used to ship 250+ enterprise agents to customers daily.
one_liner: Simulation Engine for Benchmarking AI Products

name: Golf
long_description: Golf lets you ship a production-ready MCP server without worrying about the plumbing. You just write the tools, prompts, and resources you want agents to call. Golf handles everything else - routing, auth, telemetry, error reporting, and deployment - all managed through our hosted platform.
one_liner: Open-source platform for building production MCP servers

name: Notus Autonomous Systems
long_description: We develop drones and land based autonomous robots that are designed to be controlled as groups and execute autonomous missions instead of requiring skilled operators to pilot or control. Once a critical mass of intelligent devices are deployed on the battlefield, it will fundamentally reshape the command structure of the modern military into something resembling an RTS game (Like Starcraft, Civilization, Command & Conquer, etc), reducing response times from minutes to milliseconds.
one_liner: Swarm robotics and full AI-command hierarchy integration

name: Chonkie
long_description: Chonkie breaks down large documents into smaller, meaningful chunks, making it easier for AI to process information. By ensuring that models receive only relevant and well-structured context within their token limits, Chonkie improves response accuracy and speed. Our tools are built to integrate seamlessly with any tech stack, so you can focus on leveraging your AI's full potential easily.
one_liner: Open Source Data Ingestion For AI

name: Kaelio
long_description:
Kaelio is building the AI operating system for healthcare organizations.

We unify clinical, operational, and financial data for hospitals, health systems, and health plans - giving them AI agents that flag emerging risks, and take actions to enhance clinical, financial and operational performance.

Healthcare organizations are drowning in dashboards they can't act on - or worse, flying blind because they lack the resources. We change that.
one_liner: AI operating system for healthcare organizations

name: Clarm
long_description:
Clarm is your AI-native search and agent builder on internal docs. We are the #1 alignment meeting killer.

Our first customers are delighted to pay us 10x less than they would spend on a Chief of Staff, creating daily product release notes, customer feedback analysis, capturing sales objections, and running dedicated customer support channels. The COO's hair is on fire and we put it out.

Our platform is built on agentic search, connecting across 40+ enterprise integrations - CRMs, email, knowledge bases.

Agents often fail because their underlying context windows are mismatched, leading them to hallucinate. We built enterprise native agentic search to ensure agents have all the context they need to operate fully autonomously.

Here's what Clarm's C-suite buyers use us for:

- a blockchain company to provide an on-demand source of product truth in natural language, reducing alignment meetings by 90%
- a financial services firm to supercharge their own product by integrating it with the target's enterprise knowledge
- the top 5 X25 open source startups (by star count) to increase engagement with their Github repo and knowledge base, turning repo visitors into contributors and customers
- North America's largest fertility clinic to tailor '000s of client support questions with extremely high sensitivity, driving up engagement and turning prospects into committed customers
one_liner: Perplexity for internal docs

name: YouLearn
long_description: YouLearn is an AI tutor for college students. It turns your learning materials into concise notes, an AI tutor you can talk to, and personalized tests.
one_liner: AI tutor for each student.

name: Percival
long_description:
Percival helps wholesalers and distributors automate data entry by using AI to process documents like purchase orders and price lists. 

When wholesalers and distributors sell to other businesses, they often receive purchase orders as PDFs over email. Customers frequently use different identifiers for items, different units, and close but not quite the same descriptors. Employees aren't just copy-pasting (or manually typing) PDF data into an ERP, they have to validate every item in the ERP.

With Percival, businesses can just email customer POs and other requests to a dedicated @percivaltech.com email address. Once the request is handled, Percival responds to the email with the result: whether that's an order number in the ERP or a list of prices.
one_liner: AI-powered data entry for wholesalers and distributors

name: Parsewise
long_description: Turn complex documents into validated information that business experts can trust and verify. Parsewise saves enterprises hours each day by automating human data tasks in analytics, benchmarking, and reporting workflows.
one_liner: Business Analytics for Unstructured Data

name: Jeevy Fabrication
long_description:
Jeevy Fabrication is an AI-powered contractor that connects complex weld jobs to the best-fit shops—fast. We deliver top-tier QA and total transparency, all at better traditional outsourced pricing.

Our software reduces bid and scheduling time for our in-network shops by over 80%. It converts manufacturing drawings into an accurate bill of materials and a resource-loaded, high-fidelity schedule—eliminating costly errors and rework. Using this our in-network fabricators can bid on more jobs and deliver more reliable results than their competitors. 

We also offer our clients a streamlined purchasing and project tracking experience. Clients submit purchase requests, track schedules, access key documents, and receive real-time photo updates—all in one place. We provide traceability for easy material review and maintenance of domestic content standards as required. Faster decisions, fewer delays, complete visibility.
one_liner: AI Driven EPC - Weld Fabrication Contractor

name: Sixtyfour
long_description: Instantly deploy custom research agents to source and enrich specialized professionals, company data, and insights directly into your existing systems.
one_liner: AI Agents for Research

name: Morphik
long_description: Morphik is open-source multimodal search for AI apps. We're used by customers ranging from space-tech teams searching across research papers to developers building brokerage agents.
one_liner: Open-source multimodal search for AI apps

name: Lyra
long_description:
At Lyra, we believe B2B sales hasn’t meaningfully evolved in decades — until now. The next industrial revolution is here, and we’re building the platform to power it.

Modern buyers want less talk, faster decisions, and seamless experiences. Lyra helps sales teams close more deals, shorten sales cycles, and operate more efficiently — all with minimal rep involvement.

We built our own meeting software from the ground up with a real-time AI agent at its core:
- Surfaces and personalizes relevant sales collateral using live conversation intelligence
- Keeps deals moving by answering buyer questions when reps are offline
- Replaces decks, screen shares, and long email threads with a single interactive workspace — called a Lyra. It hosts your meetings, onboarding, and integrates tools like DocuSign to give buyers a seamless path from first call to signed contract

Hundreds of sales calls are already hosted on Lyra, including several YC companies. We hit $100K ARR in our first two weeks.

We’re rethinking the sales stack from first call to signed contract.
one_liner: AI-Native Zoom For Revenue Teams

name: Prism
one_liner: AI-native Datadog + Amplitude

name: Nixo
long_description: Most orgs think custom implementations are slow because each one is too unique. In reality, FDEs lose days chasing customers for details and redoing overlapping work. With Nixo, you can scope customer problems faster, discover opportunities to reuse code, and get instant visibility into workload across accounts.
one_liner: The first ops platform built for FDEs

name: QualGent
long_description:
QualGent is an AI Mobile App Quality Assurance Tester that mimics a real human, helping teams catch bugs and ship faster - without hiring more QA testers. One customer reached #3 in the Education category on the App Store by improving app quality with QualGent.

Mobile bugs hurt: crashes kill ratings, broken checkouts drive churn. QualGent helps teams scale QA effortlessly and avoid Sonos-level disasters.

The idea for QualGent was born from the founders’ experience leading engineering teams at Google across Android XR, Stadia, Quick Share, and foldable devices where shipping to billions of users meant constantly facing the painful trade-off between moving fast and maintaining quality. With prior research experience at Nvidia, Maryland, and Berkeley, the team saw a clear opportunity: use AI to scale QA.

QualGent’s vision is to close the loop on software creation. As AI enables engineers to code 100x faster, QualGent eliminates the next bottleneck—software verification—unlocking truly scalable, end-to-end software development.
one_liner: AI Mobile App Quality Assurance Tester

name: Klavis AI
long_description: Klavis AI is open source MCP integrations for AI Applications. Our API provides hosted, secure MCP servers, eliminating auth management and client-side code. Co-founder Xiangkai Zeng co-authored the Gemini paper and pioneered the tool calling infrastructure for Gemini. https://www.klavis.ai/
one_liner: Open Source MCP Integrations for AI Applications

name: Boost Robotics
long_description:
Boost Robotics is building autonomous mobile manipulation robots to remotely perform manual tasks in data centers. 

The surge in AI applications is pushing data centers to scale faster than they can manage, leading to suboptimal operations and staffing shortages amid rising power and compute demands.

We save data centers millions in insurance premiums and SLA violations by increasing the frequency of inspection and maintenance while reducing the time it takes to triage and address failures.
one_liner: Robots for the inspection and maintenance of data centers

name: Cactus
long_description:
Open-source inference engine for deploying AI locally on smartphones. Available in React-Native, Flutter, and C/C++. Supports multimodal models, text-to-speech, embedding models and more.

Repo: https://github.com/cactus-compute/cactus
Discord: https://discord.gg/nPGWGxXSwr
one_liner: Deploy AI models locally on smartphones.

name: MorphoAI
long_description:
We're building an AI powered platform for engineers that are building new robots and machines. 

We allow users to invent and modify machine designs in a matter of minutes, not years. Ayna and Andy, the co-founders, met during their time at Harvard and started this in 2024 as their programs were wrapping up. We're commercializing 10+ years research done by our team at Harvard and MIT on this space. Our team wrote the very first papers on applying GenAI and optimization algorithms to compose robots from parts and applying computational design to fine tune machine designs. We're bringing in our deep knowledge of modifying equipment and integrating it into factories keenly understanding what makes hardware hard. 

We take in parts under consideration, constraints and tasks at hand and our algorithm formulates and fine tunes from 100s of possible design options. All in a few clicks, so engineers can push hardware to market faster and companies can benefit from the inventions being done by their R&D teams. We already have two paying customers in the OEM and system integrator spaces. 

We are venture backed and supported by a GBP 2.5MM grant by ARIA, the UK Government's invention agency.
one_liner: Software tool for designing robots and machines

name: Scalar Field
long_description:
We’re building an AI-powered Bloomberg Terminal using Financial Agents.

I used to be a trader at Tower Research and Goldman Sachs, and I’m building Scalar Field with my co-founder Ramakant, who led engineering teams at Microsoft.

We’ve both spent our careers at the intersection of finance and technology — and we’re using that experience to reimagine how markets are analyzed and traded.

Scalar Field is built around a simple idea: most people log into a terminal because, consciously or subconsciously, they’re trying to validate a hypothesis.

But today’s terminals don’t help with that. They’re dashboards — not thinking tools.

So we built Scalar Field to change that: a platform where users can test any market hypothesis instantly using intelligent agents.

You can spin up agents that react to market events, run backtests across data from multiple asset classes, and even trigger trades when specific conditions are met — all in one place.
one_liner: Reinventing the trading terminal — one intelligent agent at a time.

name: Zero
long_description: Zero empowers knowledge workers by transforming the way they manage their email. It intelligently summarizes important messages, helps complete tasks, and even enables users to chat directly with their inbox.
one_liner: AI powered email client that manages your email so you don't have to.

name: Janus
long_description:
Janus tests conversational AI Agents for hallucinations, rule violations, tool call failures, and performance breakdowns pre-launch. We do this by simulating thousands of realistic AI users to eliminate manual testing and low-confidence in AI deployment.

Our platform generates personalized datasets to evaluate, benchmark, and improve models over time.
one_liner: Battle-Test AI Agents with Human Simulation

name: Mesmer
long_description: Mesmer is Cursor for CTOs. We give founders and CTOs full visibility into their org without drowning in meetings or chasing updates. We are a team of repeat founders and CTOs with 15+ years of experience each, including leading product development togehter at Origin Financial, a fintech started by Mesmer's CEO, as it scaled to 8-figure ARR, 100+ employees and a $400M valuation. Mesmer reached 6-figure ARR within a week of launching and is already live with companies worth over $8B, including Webflow and Origin Financial.
one_liner: Cursor for CTOs

name: WorkDone Health
long_description: WorkDone Health is an AI compliance copilot for hospitals and clinics. We are like Grammarly for doctors, finding and fixing mistakes that lead to denied insurance claims or patient lawsuits. The industry today spends $40B doing this manually.
one_liner: Real-time AI Compliance for Medical Documentation

name: Rimba
long_description:
Rimba is building an AI-powered platform to help industrial and energy companies stay compliant with environmental regulations.

Legacy systems can’t keep up with today’s complex compliance needs. Rimba offers a platform that integrates data from various software systems—like ERPs, SCADA, Sharepoint—to monitor, report, and verify emissions and other environmental data. Rimba has the capability to parse through PDFs and time-series data at scale while having an AI that continuously learns and predicts outcomes.
one_liner: AI to replace manual work in environmental compliance reporting

name: Moby Analytics
long_description: At Moby Analytics, we provide the first AI agentic platform built for financial auditors. Auditors easily create and deploy AI agents to automate audit workflows. No code, just prompts and domain expertise.
one_liner: AI financial auditors

name: Delty
long_description:
As software systems grow more complex and teams scale, key engineering work happens outside of code: product specs, docs, and architecture decisions and norms. That’s where a staff software engineer shines.

Delty is an AI staff engineer.

Like a seasoned engineer embedded in your team, Delty understands your architecture, code evolution, and constraints. It designs new software systems and grounds your coding agents with real engineering context to help you deliver reliable, scalable systems, fast.
one_liner: AI staff engineer: software architect that leads coding agents

name: Lumari
long_description: Lumari enables GTM teams to automate their manual operational work using custom-built agents that deeply understand their company context.
one_liner: Agentic internal tools

name: Code Four
long_description:
Code Four slashes the administrative burden on law enforcement through AI-driven automation. Officers spend up to a third of their shifts manually transcribing body camera footage, creating inaccuracies, reducing transparency, and cutting into frontline duties. We're here to eliminate these inefficiencies by integrating with body cameras, record management systems, and digital evidence management systems—acting as a software layer for data processing. 

We free the most overworked and underappreciated people in the world: police officers.
one_liner: Modernizing the police workflow.

name: StarSling
long_description: StarSling is building an agentic developer homepage that automates all the tasks that eat up a developer’s time after they’ve left their code editor: deployments, performance, incidents, and bugs. Open your homepage, click on a GitHub, Linear, or Sentry issue and you’ll see an Autofix button that triggers an AI agent and opens up a Pull Request with a fix, all without leaving your homepage.
one_liner: Cursor for DevOps

name: Theorem
long_description: Theorem is training models that make program verification 10,000 times faster. Using verification as a feedback loop, developers have found zero-days in GPU accelerated code and cryptography implementations, and sped up code migration in legacy systems. If you have complicated code that needs to be correct and secure, sign up for our beta!
one_liner: Program verification so even your systems engineers can vibecode

name: Airweave
long_description: Airweave is an open-source tool that lets agents search any app. It connects to productivity tools, databases, or document stores and transforms their contents into searchable knowledge bases for agents.
one_liner: Open-Source Tool That Lets Agents Search Any App

name: Aegis
long_description: Aegis is the all-in-one platform that helps healthcare providers recover lost revenue by automating insurance denial appeals—from intake to resolution. Built for billing teams, healthcare providers and hospitals.
one_liner: AI Agents to win denied health insurance claims.

name: Godela
long_description:
What if every experiment you wanted to run could be modeled using AI? 
Godela is an AI-powered physics engine that gives engineers faster, cheaper replacement to simulations and physical prototypes.
No set up, no wait. Just ask—and get simulation quality result.
one_liner: AI Physics Engine to replace simulations and prototypes

name: Docket
long_description: Docket lets you write end-to-end tests in plain English and keeps them up to date automatically—powered by real user sessions.
one_liner: AI agents for web testing

name: Pingo AI
long_description: Pingo AI is an AI language learning app that helps users build fluency through speaking. It immerses learners in realistic dialogues and personalized lessons with an AI tutor who sounds like a native speaker. Our goal is to make learning languages as simple as daily conversations with Pingo — a companion who understands your goals, remembers your progress, and keeps you motivated.
one_liner: AI companion that helps you learn languages

name: Meteor
long_description:
Meet Meteor: a Chrome-alternative that can actually do your work for you.

With agents getting better by the day (literally), we realize that it’s time to automate the boring, tedious work.

We use your browser session to empower agents to act like your personal assistants (ex. book a calendar, find cheaper flights, buy clothes on amazon etc.)

Some of Meteor’s features:

- Chat with any page
- Integrate with popular apps like Gmail, Google Calendar, Twitter etc.
- Browser agent to autonomously navigate the web and perform tasks
- More coming soon!

We're excited to usher in a new era of browsing.
one_liner: An AI-Native Browser

name: Acrely
long_description:
We provide HVAC business owners with voice AI to capture every inbound call and turn it into booked jobs.

Meet Jane, your AI-powered customer relations lead. When a customer calls and you can’t pick up, Jane does. She talks to your callers, understands their problem, and gets them scheduled — whether it’s an emergency repair, seasonal maintenance, or a quote for a new install.

HVAC is still a phone-first industry, and voice AI is just now good enough for customers to feel comfortable talking to it. Every missed call is lost revenue, and most owners have their number plastered on trucks, websites, and directories that bring in as many tire-kickers as paying customers. Jane makes sure the real money never slips through.

Inbound is our first optimization — but it’s just the beginning. We’re building the first agentic fleet for HVAC. Jane runs customer relations, booking jobs and following up with customers. Ralph is the business admin, managing PNL, scheduling crews, ordering parts, and keeping the back office humming. Joe is the technician’s right hand, guiding techs through diagnostics, troubleshooting, and safety checks in real time. Together, they form a 24/7 AI-native staff that works without breaks, remembers every detail, and scales with your business so you can focus on growing instead of juggling.
one_liner: ai-native admin for HVAC

name: MangoDesk
long_description:
We help AI teams accelerate the creation of evals and post-training data by creating bespoke data annotation pipelines in seconds and staffing them with the right domain experts.

AGI requires expert-created data and evals across domains, quickly and at volumes. Creating this data reliably is a complex operational challenge. We solve this end-to-end. 

Ankith was previously an engineer at Scale AI where he built the infrastructure for expert sourcing/screening and Gen AI data labeling operations, and Ananth previously founded a software firm with seven-figure revenue and Fortune 500 customers.
one_liner: Cursor for evals and human data

name: truthsystems
long_description:
Truth Systems provides a compliance agent to govern the use of generative AI. It translates a firm's operational policies into intelligent, real-time guardrails that monitor every AI interaction. This empowers companies to proactively block non-compliant actions and align access to AI tools with user competency. By eliminating the risks and operational blind spots associated with uncontrolled AI adoption, our platform enables enterprises to fully leverage the technology's potential without compromising security. 

We are establishing the new standard for AI governance, building a future where every professional can innovate safely and confidently.
one_liner: Building the unified governance layer for regulated industries

name: Blank Bio
long_description:
Blank Bio is building foundation models to power a computational toolkit for RNA therapeutics.

Our first model is state-of-the-art in mRNA property prediction. It simulates costly experiments, helping partners design more effective mRNA medicines faster and cheaper. Our open-source models are being used by Sanofi & GSK. We’re also collaborating with the Arc Institute to bring our RNA embeddings into the next generation of virtual cell models. 

mRNA design is just the beginning. As the model improves, we’re extending to applications like target ID, novel biomarker discovery, patient stratification, and more. We’ve spent decades applying machine learning to biology across academia (Ph.D.’s at the University of Toronto) and industry (Recursion, Deep Genomics, Amazon). 

Contact us to learn more: founders@blank.bio
one_liner: Computational toolkit for RNA therapeutics

name: Gaus
long_description:
Gaus is building AI agents for individual investors.

Founded by Bruno Koba (Nubank, monashees) and Daniel Tulha (Stripe, Robinhood), Gaus gives every active investor an AI investment analyst working around the clock to surface their next great investment. We’re backed by YC (S25).

Retail investors now account for 25% of all U.S. trading volume, nearly double from 2012. But over 56% still say they don’t feel confident in their investment decisions. Gaus fixes that. 

Our AI agents uncover opportunities, decode emerging trends, and deliver analysis tailored to you. Instead of drowning in noise, investors gain a clear edge, shifting from guesswork to confident decision-making.
one_liner: AI agents for individual investors

name: Lanesurf
long_description: We help freight brokers book shipments with vetted carriers at the best price, by negotiating rates across multiple calls in parallel.
one_liner: Voice AI for booking freight

name: Async
long_description:
Async is a platform to manage a team of coding agents from anywhere.
It lets you issue tasks, then handles coding and testing in the background. Review results on mobile or desktop, preview changes in-app, run tasks in parallel, and move faster than ever before.

Our mission is to do the work that you don't want to: bug fixes, UI tweaks, papercuts, and KTLO.
Do what's important - delegate the rest to Async.
one_liner: A team of coding agents in your pocket

name: Shor
long_description:
Shor is a new Employer-of-Record built from the ground up with AI agents and stablecoins. We enable remote teams to hire and pay global employees at a fraction of the cost. The process is fast, simple, and fully compliant.

Today, global payroll is broken. Payments take days, cost 5–10% in fees, and force companies to navigate complex banking, tax, and labor regulations. Platforms like Deel and Rippling solved this for large enterprises but remain too expensive and cumbersome for the millions of startups and growing remote teams scaling globally.

Shor fixes this by combining autonomous AI agents with stablecoin-based settlement. Our agents handle contracts, worker classification, compliance, and payroll automatically in a simple, messaging-first experience. Payments can settle in seconds rather than weeks at a fraction of the cost of legacy providers.

We are making global payroll fast, affordable, and accessible for the millions of companies left out by legacy platforms.
one_liner: The fastest, most affordable payroll for global teams

name: Pond
long_description: We’re building an AI-native messaging app. Pond is a desktop app you can use with your existing messaging services like iMessage (and soon WhatsApp + more). You can see important messages you haven’t replied to, snooze conversations, answer customers in your voice, and more.
one_liner: Superhuman for text messages

name: ContextFort
long_description:
ContextFort is bringing the power of AI to the three trillion dollar construction industry, starting with an AI co-pilot that reviews every revision of your architectural and structural drawings in minutes—not weeks.

Our Software:
• Detects missing or conflicting dimensions across sheets
• Highlights overlay mismatches between versions
• Checks if an issue is already resolved in the latest set
• Auto-drafts spec-compliant RFIs so you hit “send,” not “type”

Contractors save 2-3 weeks per project, cut costly rework, and keep schedules on track.
one_liner: Automating drawing reviews for construction contractors

name: Sentinel
long_description: Sentinel is your 24/7 on-call engineer which investigates, diagnoses and suggests resolutions for production issues. Sentinel helps teams reduce alert fatigue and downtime, saving engineers from firefighting so they can focus on building.
one_liner: AI on-call engineer

name: Design Arena
one_liner: World's largest crowdsourced benchmark for AI-generated design

name: Lotas
long_description: At Lotas, we're accelerating data science with AI. Our first product, Rao, is a fork of RStudio with an embedded AI assistant that is aware of the project’s context (both files and variable environment), can read and write files, can run code or commands, and can interpret textual or visual output. It works with any of the file formats already in RStudio (R, notebooks including RMDs and QMDs, Python, Stan, etc.), allowing it to iteratively perform entire data analyses.
one_liner: Cursor for RStudio

name: Orange Slice
long_description:
Orange Slice uses AI agents to crawl the internet for signals/firmographic data that help sales teams find high-intent prospects by continuously monitoring the internet for buying signals and firmographic changes.

Our agents scan millions of data sources - including company websites, news articles, job postings, press releases, and social media - to detect meaningful events such as leadership changes, product launches, funding rounds, hiring trends, and more. These insights are transformed into actionable sales signals that indicate a company’s likelihood to purchase your product.

With Orange Slice, revenue teams can prioritize outreach, personalize messaging, and dramatically improve conversion rates by engaging the right accounts at the right time - based on what’s actually happening, not just static firmographics.
one_liner: AI agents that find you customers who already want to buy

name: Cyberdesk
long_description:
Cyberdesk is the computer use agent for developers to automate legacy Windows apps. 

We've designed our agent to follow memorized steps reliably, while falling back to computer use models during unexpected popups. Customers in healthcare, finance, and more are using our agent to automate EHRs, accounting apps, and other legacy apps.

We’d love to talk with you!
https://cal.com/mahmoud-al-madi-klrs5s/30min
one_liner: The computer use agent for developers to automate Windows apps

name: Imprezia
long_description: The first advertising infrastructure designed specifically for AI apps. Seamlessly integrate contextual brands & products that enhance user experience while generating revenue to pay the inference bills.
one_liner: The World's First AI-Native Ad Network.

name: Alter
long_description:
Alter is a zero-trust identity and access control platform purpose-built for AI agents. It wraps every tool call in strong authentication, fine-grained authorization, and real-time guardrails, so agents can move fast without breaking things.

Each request is verified at the parameter level, authorized against granular policies, executed with least-privilege access, and fully audited in real time. Unsafe actions, whether it’s a rogue DROP TABLE or a payment above policy limits, are blocked before they touch production. Behind the scenes, Alter manages credentials, issuing ephemeral, scope-narrowed access for every interaction, then rotating or expiring it in seconds. The result: no long-lived secrets, no blind spots, and no surprises in audit.

With Alter, teams can move fast on AI agent initiatives while staying fully compliant with SOC 2, HIPAA, GDPR, and internal security standards. A CISO-ready dashboard delivers real-time visibility, detailed audit logs, and compliance-ready controls, removing silos, eliminating excessive permissions, and providing complete oversight of every agent workflow.
one_liner: Secure access control and authorization platform for agent workflows

name: DeepGrove
long_description: Developing the next suite of 1-bit foundation models that can run on edge devices.
one_liner: Frontier Intelligence. On Any Device.

name: Keystone
long_description: Keystone autonomously builds and maintains end-to-end tests for your application. Never write another test or run through manual QA again.
one_liner: AI agents that test your application.

name: Sidekick
long_description: Just chat to build powerful, multi-step automations. No more tangled flowcharts or endless dropdowns.
one_liner: The simplicity of ChatGPT meets the power of Zapier

name: Wedge
long_description: Healthcare is going bankrupt without AI. Wedge is the all-in-one AI solution for hospitals and health organizations. We allow them to effortlessly deploy and monitor AI solutions.
one_liner: The trust layer for health AI implementation.

name: Slashy
long_description:
Slashy is a general agent that connects to your G-Suite, Slack, Notion, Linear, and more to take in your personal context and perform actions. 

Consider it an agentic Glean that allows knowledge workers to save 2-3 hours a day of busy work.
one_liner: ChatGPT with Hands

name: BootLoop
long_description: BootLoop is building the first AI agent to write and test firmware on real hardware. Existing AI coding assistants fail completely with embedded systems, but our agent ingests datasheets, schematics, and other design files to write firmware in your style and automatically test it on your hardware.
one_liner: Firmware in minutes, not months - rigorously tested on real hardware

name: Doe
long_description: Doe embeds intelligent, task‑specific AI agents inside private‑equity‑owned service groups, starting with dental service organizations. The platform plugs into practice management, ERP, communication tools, and supplier catalogs to run procurement, approvals, scheduling, and analytics end‑to‑end, delivering immediate EBITDA lift and data visibility.
one_liner: Autonomous AI workforce for PE roll-ups

name: IronLedger.ai
long_description:
IronLedger provides AI agents for property accounting, starting with accounts payable. We eliminate 100s of hours of expense work for 1000s of multifamily units every month. Soon, we'll be providing end-to-end accounting services including automated billbacks, month-end close and bank reconciliation.

https://www.ironledger.ai/
one_liner: AI agents for property accounting
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Preempt
long_description:
We're building www.TheInterface.com, a virtual world for AI.  

We believe world experience data is the future of AI, and collecting this data from the real world is time-consuming and limited. So we’re building a virtual world—a place for humans to prototype and game with AI.
one_liner: An applied simulations lab.

name: Trace
long_description:
Trace is a workflow automation platform that pairs each task with the right human or AI agent. It connects to your internal tools to build a unified index of people, activity, and docs and learns how your teams work. 

Trace breaks workflows into clear steps, sends repetitive tasks to AI agents, and routes the rest to the right people while respecting permissions and logging every action. 

We help teams cut busywork and unify AI tools across departments – without disrupting operations.
one_liner: Workflow engine routing repetitive tasks to AI agents

name: Candytrail
long_description:
Candytrail uses AI Agents to run your sales funnel on autopilot and train your reps.

• AI Lead Discovery: Web-crawling agents crawl your ideal market to surface high-intent leads and deliver personalized outreach. You receive a curated list of buyers plus a ready-to-send, personalized email crafted to maximize replies.

• Conversation Intelligence: Every call is automatically recorded, transcribed, and scored. Candytrail’s pattern-engine highlights the phrases, objection-handling tactics, and talk-time ratios that correlate with closed deals.

• Auto-Coaching at Scale: Reps get real-time tips on winning conversation patterns, and managers can drop timestamped feedback that lands straight on each rep’s phone—delivering “ride-along” insights after every single call.

We’re starting with Med Spas, but support any sales organization from B2B SaaS to cash-pay clinics.
one_liner: AI Agents that run your sales funnel and train your reps

name: Channel3
long_description:
Channel3 is building a database of every product on the internet.

Google and OpenAI maintain vast product graphs, but keep that valuable data to themselves. Channel3 gives every developer access, opening a world of possibility for new shopping experiences across any vertical. For instance, developers could build AI fashion stylists or give their agents shopping capabilities.

We don’t just collect product data; we actually understand it. With the latest image classification and reasoning models, we can match products across merchants—even when listings and images differ—recognize variants, and surface the perfect matches for every search. As we grow, we’ll capture unique insights into what users want, click, and buy.

As AI models get smarter and cheaper, our flywheel accelerates: our catalog will improve, and it will be even easier for developers and vibe-coders to build on our infrastructure. To further incentivize building on Channel3, we provide built-in monetization; developers earn commissions on sales they drive.

Alex discovered this need while building an AI tutor that could recommend products and earn affiliate revenue. When no solution existed, he persuaded his smartest friend from Duke and former co-founder George to leave Palantir and build Channel3 together.
one_liner: Database of every product on the internet

name: GhostEye
long_description:
GhostEye offers offensive AI agents that generate sophisticated social engineering campaigns across a multitude of attack vectors.

Leveraging natural language prompts, GhostEye creates personalized campaigns in seconds, in what used to take hours.
one_liner: AI that red teams the human mind

name: Comena
long_description: We build AI agents that automate order processing for industrial distributors and manufacturers. Say goodbye to inside sales teams spending hours on manual data entry. Comena streamlines order and quote entry, from inbox to ERP, freeing up sales teams to focus on high-value activities and proactive selling.
one_liner: AI agents for distributors and manufacturers to automate order entry.

name: VibeFlow
long_description: VibeFlow generates full-stack web apps from prompts with n8n-style visual workflows for the backend. Users of tools like Lovable or v0 can easily iterate over frontends because they can see them, while backends remain closed black boxes that are hard to evolve through prompting. VibeFlow opens up backend logic, making it visual and editable, with powerful integrations built in.
one_liner: Prompt to full stack app with visual workflows

name: Nozomio
long_description:
Nozomio is a product lab building engineers for the age of AI.

As coding agents become ubiquitous, the real bottleneck shifts from “write code” to “know which code and docs to feed them.” Starting with the tool named Nia, the mission is to provide context enrichment through agentic research and indexing of any external codebase(-s) or documentation via MCP / API.

Nozomio started with Arlan's early frustration with the agentic coding ecosystem, especially around context and memory. After winning Product of the Day in February and raising pre-seed, Arlan moved to London and then to SF as a solo immigrant from Kazakhstan to build the future of software engineering. 

try nia at trynia .ai <3
one_liner: Engineers for AI era, starting with contextual layer for coding agents

name: Mohi
long_description:
We help people understand their agent workflows and where they went wrong.

We met early on at MIT and built a bunch of projects together for fun. Of course when the AI wave took over, we were excited about agents. We made our own agents, and we always found it annoying figuring out if they consistently worked or not.

We believe that it should be easy to know what your agents are doing and why, no matter the use case or the tech stack. So that's exactly what we're helping companies achieve; we started building a few weeks ago and are working with our design partner to get deep observability and insights into their agent executions.

The future is autonomous; AI agents will be everywhere. Mohi can make sure that we humans know what these agents are doing.
one_liner: Analyze and understand complex agent workflows with clarity.

name: Riff
long_description:
Riff is a super powered music editor where experienced producers can be dramatically more productive and hobbyists can delight in music without needing technical chops.

As we continue to build, we see Riff turning into an entirely new paradigm for creating music.
one_liner: Cursor for music production

name: Solva
long_description:
Harvey for insurance - AI that automates insurance claims and stops wrongful payouts

We've spent the last decade battling legacy systems and dogma across highly regulated sectors of the financial industry. Between the three of us we have experience from scaling Europe’s fastest-growing InsurTech and founding a licensed bank (EBA CRD CI).
one_liner: Harvey for insurance

name: Phases
long_description: We’re building the first full-stack AI agent company to automate clinical trials for pharma companies.
one_liner: Automating clinical trials with agents, starting in recruitment

name: mcp-use
long_description:
mcp-use provides open-source dev tools and infrastructure for MCP to help dev teams quickly build and deploy custom AI agents with MCP servers. 
Our library has over 100,000 downloads and 4,000 stars, and is used by hundreds of engineers at big enterprises.
We provide a hosted and self-hosted platform that manages auth, access control, and multi-user environments for secure MCP agents deployment at scale.
one_liner: Open-source dev tools and infrastructure for MCP.

name: Motives
long_description: Motives is a team of AI agents that runs qualitative research projects for consumer brands: moderating and analyzing video interviews to help brands understand consumer preferences and test new ideas, in hours instead of weeks.
one_liner: Qualitative consumer research run by AI

name: Finto
long_description: Finto builds an AI platform that automates the invoice-to-pay process for enterprises operating on ERP Systems. Cutting out 80% of the accountants daily work in invoice recording, account coding and  invoice approvals.
one_liner: AI accounting for enterprises

name: Autosana
long_description:
A cloud-based tool for mobile teams to run natural language end-to-end tests. Eradicates the need to write/maintain E2E tests and manual testing. Seamlessly integrates into your CI, supports both iOS and Android, and is framework-agnostic (React Native, Flutter, Swift, etc).

No code, no setup, just catching bugs before users do.
one_liner: QA agent for mobile apps

name: Socratix AI
long_description:
Socratix builds AI coworkers for fraud and risk teams so that humans don't have to spend their days drowning in alerts and spreadsheets.

Today, fraud and risk teams at fintechs and banks are overwhelmed. Analysts jump between tools, manually stitch together context, and make judgment calls under pressure, often for hundreds of alerts a week. Too much of their work is slow, repetitive, and error-prone. We're here to change that. 

Socratix gives fraud and risk teams AI coworkers that investigate alerts in real time, replacing manual reviews with fast, explainable decisions. Socratix agents plug into existing workflows and reason across signals just like human analysts to help teams reduce fraud losses, minimize false positives, and scale operations without scaling headcount.

We've seen this problem firsthand. At DoorDash, Riya helped save $30M+ a year by building smarter fraud detection and investigation tooling, and at Unit21, she built products for analysts that made them 3X faster. We're able to build and sell enterprise-grade software. At Cruise, Satya built scalable AI systems powering petabyte-scale data, and at LinkedIn, he built enterprise products from 0 to 1 generating $50M+ in incremental revenue. Now, the two of us are teaming up to eliminate the manual toil in fraud and risk.

We're obsessed with fraud, LLMs, real-world automation, and the messy edge cases traditional ML has trouble handling. We believe that every fraud analyst should have an AI coworker - and the future of fraud will involve combining human-level reasoning with machine-speed execution.
one_liner: AI coworkers for fraud and risk teams.

name: Observee
long_description:
All AI Agents rely on external integrations to become truly useful. Our software provides any AI Agent developer with access to over 1,000 MCP integrations through a single API. 

In the last 6 months, MCP has become the official protocol for connecting AI agents to the outside world. Observee provides developers with Authentication, Observability and Security in one hosted MCP. 

As AI Agents increasingly take on more manual jobs, they will rely on Observee for underlying infrastructure.
one_liner: Access 1000+ MCP integrations with a single API

name: Eden
long_description:
Eden allows e-commerce brands to use customer data effectively when running campaigns. We help marketing teams understand their customers' stories by using data from their store, sales, support tickets, and marketing channels to turn hesitant browsers into customers who buy.

Alex and Jason met at TJHSST where they became nationally ranked debate partners and eventually coworkers at Datadog. Alex led operations at Phia, scaling to 100+ brand affiliate partners. Jason led retargeting ads at Reddit and previously sold an AI recruiting startup.

Existing marketing data sits in silos, underutilized. AI enables marketers to unlock a treasure trove of data to create more effective campaigns in a fraction of the time. We will make every marketing department data-driven.
one_liner: We turn customer and brand data into campaigns that convert

name: SigmanticAI
former_names: BitForge (in process of incorporating as SigmanticAI Inc due to trademark)
long_description:
SigmanticAI is building an AI-native hardware development assistant that automates the entire RTL design flow, from natural language to synthesizable HDL and testbenches, inside a seamless VSCode fork. Powered by fine-tuned Verilog LLMs, reinforcement learning, and real compiler feedback, SigmanticAI iteratively refines code until it compiles and passes synthesis, no matter how complex the design. It’s like the Cursor for HDL design. 

In addition to code generation, SigmanticAI can generate token-level annotations and onboarding documents to accelerate ramp-up for new engineers. With support for both cloud and on-prem deployment, it integrates with existing EDA tools to dramatically reduce debug time, improve collaboration, and accelerate hardware design across teams
one_liner: Suite of AI Agents and Tools to Accelerate HDL Design

name: Certus AI
long_description:
Certus AI is replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI.

Restaurants lose up to $100,000 per year per location from missed calls, lost orders, and abandoned hold lines. Staff are overwhelmed. IVRs frustrate customers. Call centers are expensive and impersonal.

It’s 2025. Guests don’t leave voicemails or wait on hold. They just move on.

Certus is an AI voice agent built for restaurants. It answers every call, 24/7 — taking orders, processing deliveries, booking reservations, upselling, and handling complaints in English, Spanish, French and more. Certus is built to manage the phone line end to end, from the customer call to the restaurant tech stack, with zero human intervention required. It currently integrates with industry-leading systems like Toast, Square, Clover, UberEats, DoorDash, and more.

We’re building the voice layer of the modern restaurant — the employee they’ll never fire.

We started Certus because we lived the pain. Gurveer (CEO) grew up answering phones in his family’s restaurant and helped operate them, growing from 1 to 11 locations in 7 years. Later, he and Adam (CRO) ran a restaurant growth startup to help others increase revenue, but kept watching clients bleed cash because no one picked up the phone. So we built the solution the industry always wished existed.

Until now, this problem was considered unsolvable. But Voice AI has finally crossed the conversational chasm and 72% of consumers now prefer AI over humans as long as it means faster and better service.

More importantly, the market is begging for this. The North American restaurant industry crossed $1 trillion in 2024, and it's projected to hit $1.5 trillion in 2025. Yet over $100 billion is still lost annually to missed calls, human error, and outdated tech. As the market continues to grow, so do the losses!

Our customers say it best:

- “Certus changed my life overnight.”
- “We were losing the ability to give great in-house service — the phone was killing us.”
-  “70% of my business comes through the phone. That’s mine and my 16 staffs livelihood.”
- “Before Certus, I used to lose 40 - 60 calls a day…. now my printer just stays printing!”
-  “I’ve been in the business 38 years. I’ve been waiting for this since then.”

Certus is here to fix the $120B phone problem — one call at a time.

And in doing so, we’re redefining how the restaurant industry communicates forever, starting with the phone line.
one_liner: Replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI

name: dScribe AI
long_description:
dScribe AI uses autonomous drones and 3D vision to track bulk inventory. We're starting by helping the ag and mining industry track stockpiles of grain and gravel.

Bulk inventory tracking is broken. Companies either rely on guesstimates or pay for expensive manual surveys which are still off by 20 to 30%. Without accurate numbers, it’s hard to plan logistics, like how many truckloads are needed. And it creates accounting issues by misreporting inventory value, hurting financial planning and leading to missed opportunities.

We’ve lived this problem, and we know how to solve it. Warren saw it firsthand as a Product Manager at Milk Moovement, a $20M Series A AgTech startup, working closely with feed suppliers and farm managers. Jordan scaled Microsoft Azure’s largest public API, handling over 700M requests/month, and sold software to a public company. Cole was engineer #3 at Tropic, scaling it from seed to Series B, and later led engineering at an AI startup.

We’ve built an integrated hardware and software platform that’s now being piloted by some of the largest agriculture and construction companies in North America. As industries demand real-time visibility into the physical world, dScribe AI is positioned to become the system of record for inventory that don’t fit in traditional boxes and barcodes.
one_liner: Track bulk inventory with autonomous drones and 3D vision

name: stagewise
long_description:
stagewise is the first frontend coding agent for existing production-grade web apps. It lives right inside your browser, makes changes in your local codebase and is compatible with all kinds of frameworks and setups - allowing it to be retrofitted into any existing project.

Our agent enables you to show and tell what you want to change - all while using your app on localhost and without having to switch to external tools. Making changes is as easy as selecting elements, giving a simple prompt like “make it green and put it in the top right corner”, and immediately seeing the result.

We're two founders from Germany who met while working at a B2B SaaS startup. With backgrounds in both enterprise engineering (Rheinmetall, dSPACE) and building web apps used by thousands, we have the unique blend of discipline and product sense needed to build this.

After making our initial launch with the open-sourced toolbar that puts your favorite coding agent right inside your browser and going viral with it, we’re now launching a high-speed coding agent dedicated to frontend development - taking our product and the experience of our users to the next level.

Our vision is to empower anyone to create well-designed applications, regardless of their technical skill. We start with developers who lack design experience, but our ultimate goal is to change how products are built. stagewise will enable non-technical stakeholders - product managers, designers, and marketers - to directly iterate on the UI themselves, creating a new, collaborative workflow and making us the essential tool for building on the web.
one_liner: The frontend coding agent for production codebases

name: Clodo
long_description:
Clodo is the AI Assistant for Real Estate Agents. 

Clodo helps agents remember and follow up with all their leads. Building up your database and following up with leads are the two most valuable actions you can perform as a real estate agent. Currently, both of these tasks involve spending hours sifting through dashboards and spreadsheets, and a lot of guesswork.

With Clodo, we see agents effortlessly performing both those tasks and turning their database into a stronger engine for business.
one_liner: The AI Assistant for Real Estate Agents
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: TectoAI
long_description: We help your company identify roles that can be filled by agentic AI tools, onboard them quickly, monitor their performance and behavior post deployement, ensure they remain compliant, and aligned with regulations. Tecto is building the HR system for managing your AI employees!
one_liner: Governance for AI Employees

name: Vulcan Technologies
long_description:
Vulcan uses AI to map every law, regulation, and court case in America, allowing government agencies and businesses to replace massive consulting projects with instant automated analyses. We call this "intelligent legal cartography."

In 3 months, we went from zero customers to Virginia's Executive Order 51, requiring all state agencies to use Vulcan. We are now live with the U.S. Department of Education, a regulatory reform PAC in South Carolina, and have a pipeline of several additional state and federal agencies and major enterprises.

Our initial agency partners use legal cartography to draft lawful regulations, respond to public comments on regulations, and instantly generate mandatory cost-benefit analyses.

We have both public and private sector visions. In the public sector: we endeavor to automate the entire regulatory process end-to-end; replacing the consulting industrial complex with software. In the private sector: we plan to automate regulatory compliance, tackling the $4 trillion regulatory cost on the U.S. economy.
one_liner: AI regulatory drafting and compliance

name: Outrove
long_description:
We’re building the next-generation sales and marketing automation platform, designed for how B2B go-to-market will work in the AI era.

As channels and content formats shift dramatically, we’ll be the OS companies rely on to power their future GTM strategies.
one_liner: AI-native Salesforce

name: Freya
one_liner: Voice AI Agents For Financial Services And Other Regulated Industries
